content.prompt: W. E. B. Du Bois differed in philosophy from Booker T. Washington in that Du Bois believed

choices.label: African Americans should pursue immediate and full equality
economic success would lead to political equality
job training was ultimately more important than formal education
civil rights would come through local efforts rather than national organization
segregation was a southern problem more than a national one

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
